items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars mock neck
items.body: This dress is very warm and comfortable. I returned it because I didn't read that is had a mock neck. I was looking for something with a jewel neckline. Be sure to read carefully description. I was charged for returning it and was not given full return!!! Read more
items.author: Plodding

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classy Fabric and Color, Not Ideal for Long Torsos
items.body: I ordered the Navy in size Small (Iâ€™m 5â€™9â€, 125 lbs, 27â€ waist, 34â€ bust, 37â€ hips). The color is gorgeousâ€”rich and elegantâ€”and the fabric feels soft, cozy, and non-itchy. Itâ€™s a perfect weight for fall and winter, and the pleated skirt drapes beautifully. The challenge is the waist seam placement. On me, with a longer torso, the waist hits much higher than my natural waistâ€”closer to under the bust. It throws off the proportions and makes the silhouette less flattering. I donâ€™t think the dress is poorly made; itâ€™s just not cut for long-torso frames. For average or shorter torsos, I imagine the fit would be much more flattering. Pros: Gorgeous navy color Soft, warm wool blend fabric Elegant pleated skirt and mock neck design Machine washable Cons: Waist seam sits high, not ideal for long torsos Overall the Sweater Dress is beautiful and perfect for fall and winter months. Just wish it had a longer torso. Read more
items.author: KC Heart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Office to holiday party ready
items.body: Very cute and professional enough for the office! Only reason for my return was I need to size down! Great color for a Christmas party as well! Read more
items.author: Meredith P.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Fit right to the size . Super good quality Read more
items.author: lilibet fernandez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chic fall/winter dress!
items.body: I have many, many items made by Arach & Cloz, and they never disappoint. This dress is no exception. It's soft, comfortable, and well made. I have a very long torso, so the fit is just a bit off for me - the waistline sits a little higher than I would like, however, it's not a deal breaker. The color is really lovely - it's less of an olive green and more of a forest green, but I actually prefer this. It's made a really lovely dress to wear to formal holiday dinners, and it looks great with tights and boots or heels. I do wish that the neckline was lower, or even a v-neck. The high neck, I feel, make my chest look bigger, and I don't need help with that at all. :) Other than that, it's a really nice dress. Read more
items.author: mumin3D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It checks all the boxes of what you need in a wool blend dress!
items.body: If youâ€™re someone who loves wearing dresses year-round but canâ€™t stand freezing your way through winter, this wool-blend sweater dress from Arach&Cloz might honestly be the answer. It has quickly become my favorite winter dressâ€”and hereâ€™s why. ðŸ The Color & Style Are Perfect for Cold Weather The rust shade is a true burnt orange, warm and rich in a way that feels made for fall and winter. The pleats start at just the right place to flatter the waist without adding bulk, and the length hits just under the calvesâ€”long enough to keep you cozy, but not so long that it feels dated. It strikes that perfect balance between classic and modern. ðŸ§µ A Sweater Dress Without the Bulk This is genuinely a true sweater dress, but itâ€™s been done so well. The wool blend isnâ€™t scratchy (I was surprised!) and the dress doesnâ€™t trap heat like many winter knits do. Instead, it feels soft, comfortable, and breathableâ€”warm enough for cold days, without that heavy, overheated feeling. And the matching fabric belt adds shape without being fussy. ðŸ’ Easy to Accessorize The neckline is a smart design choice: warm enough for winter but still flattering with most necklaces. Dress it up with jewelry, or keep it simpleâ€”the dress works either way. ðŸ‘  From Workday to Dinnerâ€”Effortlessly One of my favorite things about this dress is its versatility. I can wear it to work during the day, then head straight to dinner with friends without feeling underdressed or wishing I had time to go home and change. Itâ€™s polished, comfortable, and moves well with your body. âœˆï¸ A Great Travel Piece The fabric makes this a surprisingly good travel dressâ€”easy to pack, looks good right out of the suitcase, and pairs well with so many pieces. You can dress it up with boots and jewelry or throw on sneakers and a denim jacket for a casual look. Most sweater dresses canâ€™t do that without looking bulky or shapelessâ€”this one can. ðŸ“ Fit & Sizing The fabric is forgiving, and I sized up out of caution since sweater dresses often cling too much. But honestly, I donâ€™t think I needed to. Even a size up, it hangs beautifully and has that effortless â€œflowâ€ you want in a winter dress. The fit is flattering, comfortable, and zero-maintenanceâ€”Iâ€™m never adjusting or tugging on it throughout the day. ðŸ‘Ÿ How I Style It My favorite combo: low-rise tennis shoes, a jean jacket, loop earrings, a simple necklace, and a chunky bracelet. Itâ€™s stylish without trying too hardâ€”and so comfortable that I can focus on my day, not my dress. âœ¨ Final Thoughts Arach&Cloz really nailed it with this piece. Itâ€™s warm, flattering, versatile, and genuinely comfortable. If you want a winter dress that brings both style and comfort to your wardrobe, this one deserves a spot on your must-have list. Read more
items.author: pbgough

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Well made but not very flattering
items.body: The fabric on this dress feels nice and substantial, and itâ€™s clear that itâ€™s well made. The wool blend is soft and comfortable, making it cozy for fall and winter wear. That said, the overall shape didnâ€™t work for me. The pleated skirt sits a bit awkwardly, and the fit isnâ€™t very flattering unless youâ€™re slim and tall. It could look great on the right body type, but for me (Iâ€™m 5â€™ feet with fuller chest) the proportions just felt off. Read more
items.author: Moo Moo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater Dress
items.body: This is a really pretty and well-made dress that is super flattering! I absolutely love that the "belt" for it is not attached, so you can choose to wear it with the belt or not. I just find it too itchy for my skin, unfortunately, and it's a little too hot for me to wear regularly while working (I run hot throughout the day, busy moving around). It is a long dress, as shown in the picture, not floor length, but past your knees - so it is definitely professional or a holiday party, sort of dress! Lovely for the season! Read more
items.author: SeÃ±orita Jamie

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Taupe, Navy, Wine Red, Rust, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
